description: Logging Options enable you to configure your IoT V2 logging role and default logging level so that you can monitor progress events logs as it passes from your devices through Iot core service.

EventConfiguration.description: Configuration for event-based logging that specifies which event types to log and their logging settings. Used for account-level logging overrides.

EventType.description: The type of event to log. These include event types like Connect, Publish, and Disconnect.
EventType.markdownDescription:
The type of event to log. These include event types like Connect, Publish, and Disconnect.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Update requires: No interruption

LogLevel.description: The logging level for the specified event type. Determines the verbosity of log messages generated for this event type.
LogLevel.markdownDescription:
The logging level for the specified event type. Determines the verbosity of log messages generated for this event type.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ERROR | WARN | INFO | DEBUG | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

LogDestination.description: CloudWatch Log Group for event-based logging. Specifies where log events should be sent. The log destination for event-based logging overrides default Log Group for the specified event type and applies to all resources associated with that event.
LogDestination.markdownDescription:
CloudWatch Log Group for event-based logging. Specifies where log events should be sent. The log destination for event-based logging overrides default Log Group for the specified event type and applies to all resources associated with that event.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 512  
Pattern: ^(?!aws/)[a-zA-Z0-9_\-/.#]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

EventConfiguration.markdownDescription:
Configuration for event-based logging that specifies which event types to log and their logging settings. Used for account-level logging overrides.

AccountId.description: Your 12-digit account ID (used as the primary identifier for the CloudFormation resource).
AccountId.markdownDescription:
Your 12-digit account ID (used as the primary identifier for the CloudFormation resource).

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 12  
Maximum Length: 12  
Pattern: ^[0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: Replacement

RoleArn.description: The ARN of the role that allows IoT to write to Cloudwatch logs.
RoleArn.markdownDescription:
The ARN of the role that allows IoT to write to Cloudwatch logs.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Update requires: No interruption
